com.faltro.houdoku.util

Class SceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.util.SceneManager

  • public class SceneManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager and container for scene-related class instances. The instance of this class is the primary resource for controllers to interact with each other and access instances of non-controller-specific classes.
    See Also:
    PluginManager, ContentLoader

    • Constructor Detail

      • SceneManager

        public SceneManager(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Create the SceneManager.

        This constructor creates instances of the non-controller-specific classes used by ths class.

        Parameters:
        stage - the stage of the main application window

    • Method Detail

      • initRoot

        public void initRoot(int id,
                     Controller controller,
                     java.net.URL source)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Initialize the root (a Parent node) for a scene.

        The root is usually an individual page, i.e. the library page or the reader page. Technically, it can be anything with an FXML source and a controller.

        Parameters:
        id - the unique id to give this root; probably the controller's unique id
        controller - the controller for the root
        source - the FXML file for the root
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when loading the FXML file

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Prepare the initialized roots with preliminary operations.

        This method should be executed only once: after all roots have been initialized, and before changeToRoot/changeStageRoot has been called for the first time.

      • changeToRoot

        public void changeToRoot(int id)
        Change to the root with the given id.

        The root should have already been initialized with initRoot(int, Controller, URL).

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the root to change to

      • showConfigStage

        public void showConfigStage()
        Show the config stage, which is on a separate window.

      • changeStageRoot

        private void changeStageRoot(javafx.stage.Stage stg,
                             javafx.scene.Parent root)
        Change the given stage's scene's root to the given root.
        Parameters:
        stg - the stage to change the root of
        root - the new root

      • toggleTheme

        public void toggleTheme()
        Toggles the color stylesheet for ALL roots between light and night mode.

      • sizeStage

        private void sizeStage(javafx.stage.Stage stg)
        Set the size of a stage to the exact default variables.
        Parameters:
        stg - the stage to size
        See Also:

      • sizeStage

        private void sizeStage(javafx.stage.Stage stg,
                       double width_multiplier,
                       double height_multiplier)
        Set the size of a stage to the default variables times a multiplier.
        Parameters:
        stg - the stage to size
        width_multiplier - the width multiplier of the default values
        height_multiplier - the height multiplier of the default values
        See Also:
        DEFAULT_WIDTH, DEFAULT_HEIGHT, MIN_DEFAULT_WIDTH, MIN_DEFAULT_HEIGHT
